text:
Liga
Real Madrid: a journalist makes his mea culpa on Benzema!
The journalist of the Spanish daily AS Tomas Roncero, often skeptical about Karim Benzema, made his mea culpa last night.
07 Nov 2019, 21:20 by Mourad Bennis



The journalist of the daily AS Tomas Roncero admitted that he was particularly severe on the services provided by Karim Benzema. He apologized last night after the excellent match of the Frenchman last night against Galatasaray.




Benzema, a scorer in the Champions League




Karim Benzema + 12 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

The journalist Tomas Roncero delivered his opinion on the performances of Karim Benzema. Long skeptical about the player, now 31, the journalist told AS that he had fallen in love with the French striker. Convinced by his level of play, he made an apology by saying: "I was not fair to you".
